A vast, moonlit desert of cracked marble slabs floats in zero-gravity; from each fissure, translucent silver threads rise like reverse rain, converging on a colossal ancient Greek λ (lambda) carved out of glowing obsidian that slowly unravels into white doves made of torn parchment.
